ref.full: Vercher, E.; Llopis, F. J.; Gonzalez-Alfaro, V.; Martinez-Andreu, A. (2010) J. Chem. Eng. Data 55(3), 1430-1433.
ref.title: Refractive Indices and Deviations in Refractive Indices for Binary Mixtures of 1-Ethyl-3-methylimidazolium Trifluoromethanesulfonate with Methanol, Ethanol, 1-Propanol, and 2-Propanol at Several Temperatures
